alert.note: Alert for Kootenai, Cabinet Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 4:02PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lincoln County through 430 PM MDT... At 402 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Libby, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Libby. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 26 and 39. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
